fulltext:
Le Minh Nhat
MIDDLE WEB DEVELOPER
Phone: 036-3907-361
E-mail: minhnhat.sun1395@gmail.com
Address: 9 District, Ho Chi Minh City
      Seeking a responsible career in an organization where I can utilize my skills, knowledge to work at my level best. To grow with the 
organization and deliver best possible services. Work hard to achieve the corporate targets and goals keeping in view the corporate mission and 
vision.
KEY COMPETENCIES & OFFERINGS
C#
Angular 4
MS SQL
SAP(SQL Any Where)
MySQL
NodeJS
JQuery
ASP .NET
REST API
Entity Framework
WORK EXPERIENCE
TRG International
System Manage Data of Hotel Hilton (American)(03-2017 - 10-2017)
           Provided application management services, room, ect for Hilton hotel..
Role: Dev 
Key Responsibilities:
               ♦ Implement new and improve existing micro-services applications.
Highlights:
                 - ASP .NET, MVC
                 - Bootstrap
                 - MS SQL
                 - Entiy Framework
FPT SOFTWARE
ERP(Enterprise Resource Planning Systems)(12-2017-03-2019)
       Provide applications to manage tasks sush as: small and medium enterprise 
system, accounting - finance of member enterprise personal,..... We have 3 size Ha 
Noi, Da Nang, Ho Chi Minh, and total member is more than 500 member, I worked in 
size Ho Chi Minh, we have about 8 smallteam Dev function and big team Core, with 
9 member each team.
+ Role: Dev Function
+ Key Responsibilities:
                    - Implement new and improve existing micro-services applications.
                    - Handle business, and load data to front end
                    - Write SPs(Stored Procedure), UNIT TEST Front - end.
+ Highlights:
                    - REST API
                    - SAP(SQL Any Where)
                    - Angular 4
EDUCATION
Association in Information Technology ( Sep 2013 - Sep 2016 )
UNIVERSITY OF NATURAL 
SCIENCES
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
